text: Yoash "Chatto" Tzidon, , (November 28, 1926 â€“ July 8, 2015) was an Israeli former Air Force commander and politician.Yoash Tsiddon (Chatto): Particulars Knesset website He joined the Movement for Greater Israel, and later the Tzomet party. He was elected to the Knesset in 1988 on the Tzomet list, and was one of the instigators of the law that led to direct elections for the Prime Minister. He lost his seat in the 1992 elections. ==References== Category:1926 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Aviators Category:Members of the Knesset Category:Israeli military people Category:Jewish Israeli politicians Category:Jewish military people Category:Naturalized citizens of Israel Category:Romanian Jews
title: Yoash Tzidon
